subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Adam Wainwright shot to stardom and the Mets plunged to misery when Wainwright stuck out Carlos Beltran in the 2006 playoffs. Now, the two will try to help the Cardinals defend their title.
snippet: Adam Wainwright shot to stardom and the Mets plunged to misery when Wainwright stuck out Carlos Beltran in the 2006 playoffs. Now, the two will try to help the Cardinals defend their title.
